name: Solbyte
description: Solbyte is a Malaga company located in the  Technological Park of Andalusia (PTA) and with commercial headquarters in the Salamanca district of  Madrid. The company specializes in the  development of bespoke software  and in technological consulting. A team of  30 professionals  offer customized software development services for business management and commercial management as well as responsive web design and development of web pages, online stores, web portals and mobile applications.

locations.address: Technology Park Andalusia C / Juan López Peñalver, 21 Campanillas,
